name: escars
description:
This is the game I made for Ludum Dare 46, theme was Keep it Alive!

In escars, you are going through a forest with the task of keeping your bird companion alive, and that's all there is to it!

Credits for sprites goes to DragonDePlatino for creating "DawnLike"

Ludum Dare entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/escars
